properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, let us worship Jesus, King of nations, Lord of all. Magnificent and glorious, Just and merciful.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, King of the nations, Jesus, Lord of all. Jesus, King of the nations, Lord of all!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lavish our heart’s affections, Deepest love and highest praise. Voice, race and language blending, All the world amazed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, King of the nations, Jesus, Lord of all. Jesus, King of the nations, Lord of all!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bring tributes from the nations, Come in joyful cavalcades One thund’rous acclamation, One banner raised.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, King of the nations, Jesus, Lord of all. Jesus, King of the nations, Lord of all!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, Lord, and fill Your temple, Glorify Your dwelling place ‘Till nations see your splendor And seek Your face.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, King of the nations, Jesus, Lord of all. Jesus, King of the nations, Lord of all!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fear God and give Him glory, For His hour of judgment comes. Creator, Lord Almighty, Worship Him alone. 10. Jesus, King of the nations, Jesus, Lord of all. Jesus, King of the nations, Lord of all!{/lang-eng}
